Pre-Game Insights: The ICC T20 Cricket World Cup 2024 will be co-hosted by the West Indies and the United States, marking the first time the United States will host matches of an ICC World Cup tournament.
The cities of New York, Florida, and Dallas have been selected as the key venues in the U.S.
England enters the tournament as the defending champions, having triumphed over Pakistan in the previous edition.
The first match of the tournament will be between the United States and Canada on June 1, 2024, at Grand Prairie Stadium in Grand Prairie, TX.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The ICC T20 Cricket World Cup 2024 will feature 55 matches from June 1 to June 29, 2024.
PrimeTime Shuttle offers transportation services to the venues, ensuring a seamless journey for fans attending the matches.
